languages.text: The Bounty Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: -Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next turn. -The Bounty Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.
languages.original_text: Охотник за головами устанавливает ловушку на свободной клетке в радиусе 10 клеток от себя. Когда в радиусе 2 клеток от ловушки оказывается противник, она срабатывает: -Каждый противник в радиусе 2 клеток от ловушки получает {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} и выполняет проверку Ловкости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}. В случае провала противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до своего следующего хода. -Охотник за головами получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в начале своего следующего хода. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Добыча{/g}: цель, отмеченная как "добыча", обездвижена до своего следующего хода.

traits.locale_text: The Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: - All enemies in 2-cell radius around that trap suffer (2 × Hunter's PER bonus) direct damage and must pass an Agility resistance test with a −(2 × Hunter's PER bonus) penalty, or become immobilised until that enemy's next turn. - The Hunter gains +Hunter's AGI bonus MP at the beginning of their next turn. Prey: a prey is always immobilised until their next turn.

The Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: - Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around that trap suffers (2 × Hunter's PER bonus) direct damage and must pass an Agility resistance test with a −(2 × Hunter's PER bonus) penalty or become immobilised until the enemy's next turn. - The Hunter gains +Hunter's AGI bonus MP at the beginning of their next turn. Prey: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.

The Bounty Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: -Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next turn. -The Bounty Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.

The Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: - Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around that trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} direct damage and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. - The Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.

The Bounty Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: -Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next turn. -The Bounty Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.

languages.text: 赏金猎人在周围10格内的空格子上设置陷阱。任何进入陷阱周围2格内的敌人都会触发陷阱： - 陷阱周围2格内的所有敌人都会受到{uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。受到影响的敌人需要进行敏捷{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}点减值。未能通过检定的敌人会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续至该名敌人的下个回合为止。 - 赏金猎人在下个回合开始时额外获得{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}：如果被标记为猎物的目标触发陷阱，则必定会陷入定身状态，持续至该名敌人下个回合为止。
languages.original_text: The Bounty Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: -Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next turn. -The Bounty Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: 猎人在周围10格内的空格子上设置陷阱。任何进入陷阱周围2格内的敌人都会触发陷阱： - 陷阱周围2格内的所有敌人都会受到（2×猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}）点直击伤害。受到影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于（2×猎人的感知加成）。未能通过检定的敌人会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续至该名敌人的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。 - 猎人在下个回合开始时获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于猎人的敏捷加值。 {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}：如果被标记为猎物的目标触发陷阱，则必定会陷入定身状态，持续至该名敌人下个回合为止。

猎人在周围10格内的空格子上设置陷阱。任何进入陷阱周围2格内的敌人都会触发陷阱： - 陷阱周围2格内的所有敌人都会受到{uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}点直击伤害。受到影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}。未能通过检定的敌人会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续至该名敌人的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。 - 猎人在下个回合开始时获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于猎人的敏捷加值。 {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}：如果被标记为猎物的目标触发陷阱，则必定会陷入定身状态，持续至该名敌人下个回合为止。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎{/g}人在周围10格内的空格子上设置陷阱。任何进入陷阱周围2格内的敌人都会触发陷阱： - 陷阱周围2格内的所有敌人都会受到{uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。受到影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}点{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的敌人会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续至该名敌人的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。 - 赏金猎人在下个回合开始时额外获得{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}：如果被标记为猎物的目标触发陷阱，则必定会陷入定身状态，持续至该名敌人下个回合为止。

languages.text: El cazarrecompensas tiende una trampa en una casilla libre en un radio de 10 casillas. Cualquier enemigo que entre en un radio de 2 casillas en torno a la trampa la activa. -Cada enemigo en un radio de 2 casillas en torno a la trampa sufre {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} y debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Agilidad con una penalización de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el siguiente turno del enemigo. -El cazarrecompensas obtiene +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} al principio de su siguiente turno. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Presa{/g}: un objetivo marcado como presa siempre queda inmovilizado hasta su siguiente turno.
languages.original_text: The Bounty Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: -Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next turn. -The Bounty Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} tiende una trampa en una casilla libre en un radio de 10 casillas. Cualquier enemigo que entre en un radio de 2 casillas en torno a la trampa la activa. - Cada enemigo en un radio de 2 casillas en torno a la trampa sufre {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} y debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del enemigo. - El cazarrecompensas obtiene +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} al principio de su siguiente turno. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Presa{/g}: un objetivo marcado como presa siempre queda inmovilizado hasta su siguiente turno.

El cazador tiende una trampa en una casilla libre en un radio de 10 casillas. Cualquier enemigo que entre en un radio de 2 casillas en torno a la trampa la activa. - Cada enemigo en un radio de 2 casillas en torno a la trampa sufre {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} de daño directo y debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del enemigo. - El cazador obtiene +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} al principio de su siguiente turno. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Presa{/g}: un objetivo marcado como presa siempre queda inmovilizado hasta su siguiente turno.

languages.text: バウンティハンターが半径10セル周囲内の空のセルにトラップを設置する。設置したトラップの半径2セル周囲内に敵が入ると、トラップが発動する： -トラップの半径2セル周囲内の敵が{uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受けて、敵は−{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}のペナルティを伴うAGI{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならない。失敗した場合は敵の次のターン開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。 -ハンターが次のターン開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}獲得する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}：獲物としてマークされたターゲットが必ず次のターンまで移動不可になる。
languages.original_text: The Bounty Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: -Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next turn. -The Bounty Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: バウンティハンターが半径10セル周囲内の空のセルにトラップを設置する。設置したトラップの半径2セル周囲内に敵が入ると、トラップが発動する： -トラップの半径2セル周囲内の敵が{uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受けて、敵は−{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}のペナルティを伴うAGI{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならない。失敗した場合は敵の次のターン開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。 -ハンターが次のターン開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}獲得する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}：獲物としてマークされたターゲットが必ず次のターンまで移動不可になる。

ハンターが半径10セル周囲内の空のセルにトラップを設置する。設置したトラップの半径2セル周囲内に敵が入ると、トラップが発動する： - トラップの半径2セル周囲内の敵が{uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}の直接ダメージを受けて、敵は−{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格しなければならない。不合格の場合は敵の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。 - ハンターが次のターン開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}分だけ増加する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}：獲物としてマークされたターゲットが必ず次のターンまで移動不可になる。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が半径10セル周囲内の空のセルにトラップを設置する。設置したトラップの半径2セル周囲内に敵が入ると、トラップが発動する： - トラップの半径2セル周囲内の敵が{uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受けて、敵は−{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。不合格の場合は敵の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。 - ハンターが次のターン開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}分だけ増加する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}：獲物としてマークされたターゲットが必ず次のターンまで移動不可になる。

Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: -Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next turn. -The Bounty Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Охотник устанавливает ловушку на свободной клетке в радиусе 10 клеток от себя. Когда в радиусе 2 клеток от ловушки оказывается противник, она срабатывает: - Каждый противник в радиусе 2 клеток от ловушки получает (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} охотника) прямого урона и проходит проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −(2 × бонус ВОС охотника). В случае провала противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. - Охотник получает +бонус ЛВК охотника {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в начале своего следующего хода. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Добыча{/g}: цель, отмеченная как "добыча", обездвижена до своего следующего хода.

Охотник устанавливает ловушку на свободной клетке в радиусе 10 клеток от себя. Когда в радиусе 2 клеток от ловушки оказывается противник, она срабатывает: - Каждый противник в радиусе 2 клеток от ловушки получает (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} охотника) прямого урона и проходит проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −(2 × бонус ВОС охотника). В случае провала противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. - Охотник получает +бонус ЛВК охотника {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в начале своего следующего хода. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Добыча{/g}: цель, отмеченная как "добыча", обездвижена до своего следующего хода.

Охотник устанавливает ловушку на свободной клетке в радиусе 10 клеток от себя. Когда в радиусе 2 клеток от ловушки оказывается противник, она срабатывает: - Каждый противник в радиусе 2 клеток от ловушки получает {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} прямого урона и проходит проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}. В случае провала противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. - Охотник получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в начале своего следующего хода. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Добыча{/g}: цель, отмеченная как "добыча", обездвижена до своего следующего хода.

languages.text: Der Kopfgeldjäger stellt auf einem freiem Feld in einem Radius von 1 Feldern um ihn herum eine Falle auf. Jeder Feind, der sich der Falle auf mindestens 2 Felder nähert, aktiviert sie: - Jeder Feind innerhalb eines 2-Felder-Radius um die Falle erleidet {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} und muss eine Beweglichkeit-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} überstehen, da er ansonsten bis zu seinem nächsten Zug {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} wird. - Der Kopfgeldjäger erhält +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} zu Beginn seines nächsten Zugs. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g}: Ein als Beute markiertes Ziel ist immer bis zu seinem nächsten Zug gelähmt.
languages.original_text: The Bounty Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: -Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next turn. -The Bounty Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} stellt auf einem freiem Feld innerhalb eines 10-Felder-Radius um ihn herum eine Falle auf. Jeder Feind, der sich der Falle auf mindestens 2 Felder nähert, aktiviert sie: - Jeder Feind innerhalb eines 2-Felder-Radius um die Falle erleidet {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} und muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} überstehen, da er ansonsten bis zu seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} wird. - Der Kopfgeldjäger erhält +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} zu Beginn seines nächsten Zugs. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g}: Ein als Beute markiertes Ziel ist immer bis zu seinem nächsten Zug gelähmt.

Der Jäger stellt auf einem freiem Feld innerhalb eines 10-Felder-Radius um ihn herum eine Falle auf. Jeder Feind, der sich der Falle auf mindestens 2 Felder nähert, aktiviert sie: - Jeder Feind innerhalb eines 2-Felder-Radius um die Falle erleidet {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} Direktschaden und muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} überstehen, da er ansonsten {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} wird, und zwar bis zu seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. - Der Jäger erhält +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} zu Beginn seines nächsten Zugs. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g}: Ein als Beute markiertes Ziel ist immer bis zu seinem nächsten Zug gelähmt.

languages.text: Le chasseur de primes pose un piège sur une case libre dans un rayon de 10 cases autour de lui. Tout ennemi entrant dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de ce piège l'active : -Chaque ennemi présent dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de ce piège subit {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} et doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}. Dans le cas contraire, il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} jusqu'à son prochain tour. -Le chasseur de primes obtient +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au début de son tour suivant. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Proie{/g} : une cible désignée comme proie est toujours immobilisée jusqu'à son prochain tour.
languages.original_text: The Bounty Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: -Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next turn. -The Bounty Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Le Chasseur pose un piège sur une case libre dans un rayon de 10 cases autour de lui. Tout ennemi entrant dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de ce piège active celui-ci : - Chaque ennemi présent dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de ce piège subit (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du Chasseur) points de dégâts directs et doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -(2 × bonus de PER du Chasseur), ou il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. - Le Chasseur obtient +bonus d'AGI du Chasseur {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au début de son tour suivant. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Proie{/g} : une cible désignée comme une proie est toujours immobilisée jusqu'à son tour suivant.

Le Chasseur pose un piège sur une case libre dans un rayon de 10 cases autour de lui. Tout ennemi entrant dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de ce piège active celui-ci : - Chaque ennemi présent dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de ce piège subit {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} points de dégâts directs et doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921}, ou il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. - Le Chasseur obtient +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au début de son tour suivant. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Proie{/g} : une cible désignée comme une proie est toujours immobilisée jusqu'à son tour suivant.

languages.text: Ödül Avcısı, çevresindeki 10 hücre yarıçaplık alanın içindeki boş bir hücreye tuzak koyar. O tuzağı çevreleyen 2 hücrelik yarıçap içine bir düşman girerse tuzak etkinleşir: -Tuzağın çevresindeki 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her düşman, {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g} alır ve −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} ceza puanına sahip bir Çeviklik {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidirler. Aksi takdirde düşman {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur ve bir sonraki turuna kadar bu şekilde kalır. -Ödül Avcısı, bir sonraki turunun başlangıcında +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Av{/g}: Av olarak işaretlenmiş bir hedef her durumda felç olur ve bir sonraki turuna kadar böyle kalır.
languages.original_text: The Bounty Hunter sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: -Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next turn. -The Bounty Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.
